questions.q_questions: What type of network must a home user access in order to do online shopping?
Choose one function of intermediary devices on a network??

choices.A: They are the primary source and providers of information and services to end devices.
choices.B: They form the interface between the human network and the underlying communication network.
choices.C: They run applications that support collaboration for business.
choices.D: They filter the flow of data, based on security settings

questions.q_questions: Which description correctly defines a converged network?

options.A: a network that allows users to interact directly with each other over multiple channels
options.B: a network that is limited to exchanging character-based information
options.C: a single network channel capable of delivering multiple communication forms
options.D: a dedicated network with separate channels for video and voice services

questions.q_questions: Which two Internet connection options do not require that physical cables be run to the building?
